title.narrative: 2017 SETI Project - Teacher Training Project in Rwanda

description.narrative: The AIMS STEM Teacher Training program will enhance the capacity of in-service and pre-service secondary school teachers in STEM subjects and in the use of ICT in the classroom. Teachers will be provided with the tools and skills they need to effectively implement the new Competency-Based Curriculum in Rwanda, leveraging innovative approaches to teaching math and science and employing technology to enhance teaching, learning and assessment.
